00015 CDialogObject* GetRootDialog( CDialogObject* pDialog )
00016 {
00017     CDialogObject* pTemp = pDialog;
00018     while ( pTemp->GetParent()->GetParent() != 0 )
00019         pTemp = pTemp->GetParent();
00020 
00021     return pTemp;
00022 }
00023 
00024 int HandleInput( int iMin, int iMax )
00025 {
00026     int iSelection = 0;
00027     while( true )
00028     {
00029         cout << endl << "Make your choice: ";
00030         cin  >> iSelection;
00031         cout << endl;
00032 
00033         // If the selection is valid (within the boundaries of the answers)
00034         if ( (iSelection >= iMin) && ( iSelection <= iMax ) )
00035             break;
00036 
00037         cout << "Invalid selection. Please choose a value between " << iMin << " and " << iMax << "." << endl;
00038     }
00039     return iSelection;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void PrintReplies( vector<CDialogObject*>* vReplies )
00043 {
00044     // Loop through all the possible answers for the dialog and print them
00045     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vReplies->size(); ++i )
00046     {
00047         cout << "  #" << i + 1 << ": " << vReplies->at(i)->m_sDialogText << endl;
00048     }
00049 }

00051 void DoHandleDialog ( CDialogObject* pDialog )
00052 {
00053     // TODO: This is a terrible hack - FIX IT!!

00055     /*
00056     if ( pDialog->GetEventOnAfter().length() > 0 )
00057     {
00058         LuaScript.DoLuaScript( pDialog->GetEventOnAfter() );
00059     }
00060     */
00061 
00062     // If there is no answers available
00063     if ( pDialog->m_vpDialogs.size() == 0 )
00064     {
00065         cout << endl << "You've got nothing to say to that..." << endl;
00066         cout << "[ Back ]" << endl << endl;
00067 
00068         DoHandleDialog( GetRootDialog( pDialog ) );
00069         return;
00070     }
00071 
00072     vector<CDialogObject*>* vReplies = &pDialog->m_vpDialogs;
00073 
00074     PrintReplies( vReplies );
00075     int iSelection = HandleInput( 0, vReplies->size() );
00076 
00077     // Zero is the abort-button
00078     if (iSelection == 0)
00079     {
00080         cout << "Exit was chosen. Bye!" << endl;
00081         return;
00082     }
00083 
00084     CDialogObject* pNewDialog = vReplies->at( iSelection - 1 );
00085     if ( pNewDialog->m_vpDialogs.size() == 0 )
00086     {
00087         cout << "The chosen dialog item has no sub-items! Sue the dialog writer!" << endl;
00088         cout << "[ Back ]" << endl << endl;
00089         DoHandleDialog( GetRootDialog( pNewDialog ) );
00090     }
00091 
00092     DoHandleDialog( pNewDialog->m_vpDialogs[0] );
00093 }
